# TypoGrammar - English Learning Hub

> https://typogrammar.com
> A comprehensive English grammar and vocabulary learning platform with interactive tools, exercises, and resources for ESL learners and students.

## About TypoGrammar

TypoGrammar is a free educational platform designed to help learners master English grammar, vocabulary, and writing skills. We provide structured lessons, interactive exercises, quizzes, and reference materials organized for progressive learning.

## Core Features

- **Grammar Topics**: 50+ comprehensive lessons covering all English tenses, verb forms, sentence structures, and grammatical concepts
- **Vocabulary Resources**: Extensive collections of collocations, idioms, phrasal verbs, irregular verbs, homophones, prefixes & suffixes
- **Interactive Exercises**: Fill-in-the-blank, error correction, matching, and sentence reordering exercises
- **Quizzes**: Topic-specific quizzes with instant feedback and progress tracking
- **Writing Guides**: Essay types, paraphrasing, building arguments, and critical reading strategies
- **Reference Tools**: Glossary, grammar terminology, confused words, preposition combinations

## Main Content Areas

### Grammar Guide
https://typogrammar.com/grammar-guide
Complete reference for English grammar topics organized by category:
- **Tenses**: Present Simple, Present Continuous, Present Perfect, Past Simple, Past Continuous, Past Perfect, Future Forms

### Verb Tenses Hub
https://typogrammar.com/grammar/verb-tenses
Comprehensive guide to all 12 English verb tenses with canonical definition pages:
- **Present Tenses**: Present Simple, Present Progressive, Present Perfect, Present Perfect Progressive
- **Past Tenses**: Past Simple, Past Progressive, Past Perfect, Past Perfect Progressive
- **Future Tenses**: Future Simple, Future Progressive, Future Perfect, Future Perfect Progressive

Each tense page includes: definition, when to use, structure/formula, time expressions, examples, common mistakes, comparisons, and practice questions.
- **Verb Forms**: Active/Passive Voice, Conditional Sentences, Reported Speech, Modal Verbs, Gerunds & Infinitives
- **Sentence Structure**: Word Order, Question Formation, Relative Clauses, Linking Words
- **Parts of Speech**: Nouns, Articles, Adjectives, Adverbs, Pronouns, Prepositions

### Vocabulary Resources

#### Collocations
https://typogrammar.com/vocabulary/collocations
150+ common English word combinations organized by type:
- Verb + Noun collocations (make a decision, take a break)
- Adjective + Noun collocations (heavy rain, strong coffee)
- Adverb + Adjective collocations (highly recommended, deeply concerned)

#### Idioms & Expressions
https://typogrammar.com/idioms
500+ English idioms organized by category with meanings and examples:
- Time idioms, Money idioms, Emotions, Success & Failure, Communication, and more
- Searchable database for quick lookup

#### Homophones, Homonyms & Homographs
https://typogrammar.com/vocabulary/homophones-homonyms-homographs
Comprehensive guide to commonly confused words:
- Homophones: words that sound alike (their/there/they're)
- Homonyms: same spelling and sound, different meanings (bank)
- Homographs: same spelling, different pronunciation (bow)

#### Prefixes & Suffixes
https://typogrammar.com/prefixes-suffixes
200+ common prefixes and suffixes for vocabulary building:
- Prefixes: un-, re-, pre-, dis-, mis-, over-, under-
- Suffixes: -tion, -able, -ness, -ment, -less, -ful

#### Phrasal Verbs
https://typogrammar.com/phrasal-verbs
Essential phrasal verbs organized by verb base with meanings and examples

#### Irregular Verbs
https://typogrammar.com/irregular-verbs
Complete list of irregular verbs with base form, past simple, and past participle forms
Interactive quiz for practice

#### Commonly Confused Words
https://typogrammar.com/commonly-confused-words
Pairs and sets of words that are frequently mixed up (affect/effect, accept/except)

## Content Organization

All content is organized hierarchically:
1. **Homepage**: Overview and quick navigation
2. **Category Pages**: Grammar, Vocabulary, Writing, Practice Tools
3. **Topic Pages**: Individual lessons with explanations, examples, and exercises
4. **Reference Pages**: Searchable databases and lookup tools

## Technical Details

- Built with: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Routing: Client-side routing with React Router
- Data Structure: Static content stored in TypeScript constants
- Progress Tracking: localStorage-based user progress
- Responsive Design: Mobile-first approach with dark mode support
- Multilingual: English and Arabic language support
